definition: Austria/Austrian/abbr. for 奧地利|奥地利[Ao4 di4 li4]/Olympic/Olympics/abbr. for 奧林匹克|奥林匹克[Ao4 lin2 pi3 ke4]
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]

sentences.english: This epitome of richness dates back to 18th century Ottoman Empire.
sentences.chinese: 这件象征财富的作品出自18世纪的奥斯曼帝国。

sentences.english: The principality became tributary to the Ottoman Empire during 16th century.
sentences.chinese: 这个公国在16世纪成为了奥斯曼帝国的附属国。

sentences.english: The next summer Murad III rewarded Osman by making him grand vizier.
sentences.chinese: 在明年夏天穆拉德三奖励奥斯曼厄尔使他大总督。

sentences.english: His reign marked the beginning of the golden age of the Ottoman Empire.
sentences.chinese: 他的统治标志着奥斯曼帝国全盛时期的开始。

sentences.english: The Busho carnival incorporates the end of the Ottoman empire in Hungary.
sentences.chinese: Busho嘉年华体现了奥斯曼帝国在匈牙利结束。

sentences.english: Trade throughout the Ottoman Empire was difficult and unreliable.
sentences.chinese: 穿越奥斯曼帝国从事贸易变得困难且不可靠。

sentences.english: The tribute ended with the occupation of Qatar by the Ottoman Turks in 1872.
sentences.chinese: 进贡在1872年奥斯曼土耳其占领卡塔尔时结束。

sentences.english: The couple married two years ago.
sentences.chinese: 两年前，阿巴拉特和奥斯曼结婚。

sentences.english: In June 1876, the two principalities declared war on the Ottoman Empire.
sentences.chinese: 1876年6月，两个公国向奥斯曼帝国宣战。

definition: horseman/cavalryman/knight (i.e. European nobility)/(Tw) bike rider (scooter, bicycle etc)
Roth (name)/Kenneth Roth (1955-), executive director of Human Rights Watch 人權觀察|人权观察[Ren2 quan2 Guan1 cha2]
Schröder (name)/Gerhard Schröder (1944-), German SPD politician, Chancellor 1998-2005
Hill (name)/Christopher Hill, US undersecretary of state of East Asian affairs
